title: Vinnie's Pizzeria
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers vegan pizzas by the slice or order a whole pie; different faux meats and daiya vegan cheese. Has vegan garlic knots. Tiny dining area plus a small bench out front. Operates another location at 253 Nassau Ave, Brooklyn.
